revisionDesc.p: First release of morphology on selected portions.
Convert the Westminster Leningrad Codex files from TEI markup to OSIS book files.

work.title: BHS unaccented with Strongs
work.description: Unaccented Biblia Hebraica Stuttgartensia Hebrew with Strong's numbers by Rev. Graham.

work.title: A Concise Dictionary of the Words in the Hebrew Bible
with their Renderings in the King James Version
work.creator: James Strong, LL.D., S.T.D.
work.description: The data came from several PD sources which were full of errors. I cleaned them by comparing them to each other and (where necessary) looking at the original.
work.source: The exhaustive concordance of the Bible:

verse.note: We read the punctuation in L differently from BHQ.
Marks an anomalous form.
We read punctuation in L differently from BHS.
We read one or more accents in L differently from BHQ.
We read one or more accents in L differently than BHS. Often this notation indicates a typographical error in BHS.
Marks a place where we agree with BHQ against BHS in reading L.
Marks an anomalous form.
We read one or more vowels in L differently from BHS.
